# add(_:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an array of songs to the user’s Shazam library.

## Declaration

```swift
func add(_ mediaItems: [SHMediaItem], completionHandler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func add(_ mediaItems: [SHMediaItem]) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **mediaItems**: An array of media items that represents the songs to add to the library.
- **completionHandler**: The system calls this completion block after adding the media items to the library.

This block takes the following parameters:



## Discussion



Saving a song to the user’s Shazam library also saves the following media item properties and their associated values:

- [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItemProperty/shazamID]
- [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItemProperty/title]
- [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItemProperty/subtitle], or [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItemProperty/artist] if the subtitle is unavailable



## Adding a matched song to the library

- **default**: An instance of the user’s default Shazam library.
